lead_paragraph: Shane Harper waited a long time to score his first NHL goal. He liked the feeling so much, he scored a second one.

headline.print_headline: Harper Scores First Two NHL Goals to Lift Panthers Over Avs
headline.main: Harper Scores First Two NHL Goals to Lift Panthers Over Avs
